column1: Table 6-52:  Peat Production Area of Lower 48 States (Hectares)
a A portion of the production in 1990 is of unknown nutrient type, resulting in a total production value greater than the sum of nutrient-rich and nutrient-poor.
Sources: Calculated using peat production values in Table 6-50, an assumed yield of 100 metric tons per hectare per year.
